show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
Her “exclusive exit interview” with CNN yesterday was an innocuous gabfest. <!--more--> But Hillary Clinton gave her “official” accounting of her four years in office to the Council on Foreign Relations yesterday, detailing her triumphs in securing US interests globally with her self-branded “smart” diplomacy, and directing its “pivot” to East Asia and Africa.
Her speech as a backdrop, Leid Stories recalls some of Hillary’s greatest hits.
